body:
What if the last movie, film, or series you watched became true?
Would you survive? How screwed would you be? Would it be a happy or a bad ending?

I watched Attack on Titan last, so... uh...
body_tagged:

title: [Forum Game] A Happy Ending?

replies.body: I watched Non Stop today. If I was a random passenger, I would probably survive, but if I was the main character then I would probably be killed because I don't have pro melee fighting skillz irl xD
replies.body_tagged: I watched Non Stop today. If I was a random passenger, I would probably survive, but if I was the main character then I would probably be killed because I don't have pro melee fighting skillz irl xD

replies.body: The last movie I watched we Divergent soooo..........I would probably survive..........Good ending I guess,.............

replies.body:
Sword Art Online:
Would you survive?
If I were Kirito, probably. However I don't think anyone else would be able to beat the final boss!
How screwed would you be?
I wouldn't care to be honest. A little bit of love is fine by me! :)
It would be a great experience after all....
Would it be a happy or a bad ending?
I hate ban endings, so I would attempt to make it a happy one!
